page.title: 12Playground Games(cont)
page.content: {Hopscotch To play the game you need a stone and a series of joined boxes numbered 1 to 10. To play the game you have to throw the stone into the box shape. Whichever number the stone lands on you have to hop then jump,hop then jump to the number ten.Then you have to hop, then jump to the number the stone landed on,pick the stone up and go back to the start.Then you give the next person who is playing the stone.The other players repeat what you have just done and the game continues. The winner is the person who completes all the boxes first.
